title: Novo Nordisk to support MIT postdocs working at the intersection of AI and life sciences
summary: MIT's School of Engineering and Novo Nordisk have launched the MIT-Novo Nordisk Artificial Intelligence Postdoctoral Fellows Program. The program will support up to 10 postdoctoral fellows conducting research at the intersection of artificial intelligence and data science with life sciences. The program will provide up to $10 million for an annual cohort of postdocs for two-year terms. The program aims to advance the use of AI in life science and health and will offer professional development, mentorship, and entrepreneurship-focused workshops. The program complements a separate postdoctoral fellowship program at MIT supported by the Novo Nordisk Foundation.
